title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Special: Nekogoroshi-hen
synopsis: As a punishment for losing an intense poker game, Keiichi Maebara, Rena Ryuuguu, Mion Sonozaki, Satoko Houjou, and Rika Furude must walk around town dressed in costumes. Wanting to avoid being seen by more people, Keiichi convinces the group to visit Yagouchiâ€”a deserted neighboring village.
